steps.name: CypherCommand
commands: MATCH(e:esco__Occupation)-[]-(l:skosxl__Label) WHERE NOT EXISTS(l.skosxl__literalForm) AND EXISTS(l.esco__hasLabelRole) unwind keys(l) as p with l, count(p) as pCount WHERE pCount = 2 DETACH DELETE (l)
MATCH(l:skosxl__Label) WHERE EXISTS(l.uri) unwind keys(l) AS p WITH l, count(p) AS pCount WHERE pCount = 1 DETACH DELETE(l)
